long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of good novels being ruined by excess and misuse of punctuation? Look no further; AntiCringe aims to provide an online novel reading experience without requiring the hassle of a perpetual state of ignorance to improper punctuation. 

"You are mad!!!!" becomes "You are mad!"
"Why have you done this!????" becomes "Why have you done thisâ€½"
"Lorem ipsum dolor sit elit. ðŸ˜ŽðŸ˜’" becomes "Lorem ipsum dolor sit elit."

Extensive use of exclamation gets converted into periods. Lightweight.
Questions? Suggestions? Feedback? Please either write a comment or contact (email) me.
